amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for a 2-year rather than 5-year extension of the moratorium on state and local taxes on Internet commerce.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to provide a 2-year extension of the moratorium on state and local taxes on the Internet. The effect would continue the moratorium until October 21, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delahunt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 219 (Roll no. 156).
